e Omega

ly 12, 2001 7:02 PM

Clash


          Arrow ducks the palm and steps right into Termitron's sho=
ts meant for Stiller. He's hit by them in the back and goes down to one kne=
e.

          Burning Hammer stares at Perplex is stasis lock while everyon=
e yelled "save Trinity!" He shakes his head...

Message -----

ps.com

ct: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash
